SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.AGNT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ABS_RSON_CD' AND CD = M.ABS_RSON_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ABS_RSON_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.AGNT_UID, T.SEQ, TO_CHAR(T.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END_DT, TO_CHAR(T.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') STRT_DT, T.AGNT_RESC_ID, T.ABS_RSON_CD, T.REGR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.AGNT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ABS_RSON_CD' AND CD = T.ABS_RSON_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ABS_RSON_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM AP_AGN_APNT_D T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AGNT_UID = #{agntUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.SEQ = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.END_DT >= TO_DATE(#{durEndDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T.STRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#{durStrtDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.AGNT_UID, T.SEQ
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
